parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker position. See also [[setMarkerPos]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command is identical to [[markerPos]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getMarkerPos]] markerName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [x,y,0] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[getMarkerPos]] [markerName, preserveElevation] &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;''(Since Arma 3 v1.93)'' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [markerName, preserveElevation]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> preserveElevation (Optional): [[Boolean]] Default: [[false]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]] if ''preserveElevation'' is [[true]] or [x,y,0] if ''preserveElevation'' is [[false]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mPos1 = [[getMarkerPos]] "markerOne";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mPos2 = [[getMarkerPos]] ["markerTwo", [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerPosLocal]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
